meanings.sent1: The party was ruined by a group of jackanapeses who thought they were better than everyone else.
meanings.sent2: The teacher scolded the jackanapeses for their disrespectful behavior in class.
meanings.sent3: The jackanapeses at the office meeting kept interrupting with their arrogant comments.
meanings.sent4: The politician was surrounded by jackanapeses who only cared about their own interests.
meanings.sent5: The movie portrayed the villain as a cunning jackanapeses who always got what he wanted.

meanings.sent1: The little jackanapeses giggled mischievously as they played pranks on their siblings.
meanings.sent2: The teacher had to keep an eye on the jackanapeses in the back of the classroom.
meanings.sent3: The jackanapeses decided to draw on the walls with crayons, much to their parents' dismay.
meanings.sent4: The park was filled with the laughter of jackanapeses running around and causing chaos.
meanings.sent5: The mischievous jackanapeses snuck cookies from the jar when no one was looking.
